import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'./Products.css';import CategoryCarousel from'../../components/CategoryCarousel/CategoryCarousel';import ProductCarousel from'../../components/ProductCarousel/ProductCarousel';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Products=()=>{const[products,setProducts]=useState([]);const[categories,setCategories]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchProducts=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/products');if(!response.ok){throw new Error('Error al obtener los productos');}const data=await response.json();// Configurar los productos y las categorías dinámicamente
setProducts(data);const uniqueCategories=[...new Set(data.map(product=>product.category))];setCategories(uniqueCategories);}catch(err){setError(err.message);}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchProducts();},[]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Cargando productos..."});if(error)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Error: ",error]});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"products-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"products-title",children:"Cat\xE1logo de Productos"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CategoryCarousel,{categories:categories}),categories.map(category=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"category-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/category/".concat(category),className:"category-link",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"category-title",children:category})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductCarousel,{products:products.filter(product=>product.category===category)})]},category))]});};export default Products;
